page.title: 06DENNY'S BACON FACTORY.
page.content: {Denny's Factory}opened in Portadown in {1935}.The first branch of the factory opened in Ireland in {1812}. Pigs are killed on the premises and products from them,of all kinds-bacon,sausages,pork,liver,kidney and pig's feet,are sold to the shops.They are delivered long distances in refrigerated container lorries. Apart from pork and bacon products Denny's factory also has a department which specialises in {pies}of many kinds:pork,cottage,steak and kidney and bacon and egg.These are packed for freezing and can be bought in large stores all over Britain. To ensure that food is always in perfect condition much important research work is carried out in the laboratory at the factory.
